PurposeDescription: Breeding in captivity or artificial propagation
SourceDescription: Plants that are artificially propagated in accordance with Resolution Conf. 11.11 (Rev.CoP15), as well as parts and derivatives thereof, exported under the provisions of Article VII, paragraph 5, of the Convention (specimens of species included in Appendix I that have been propagated artificially for non-commercial purposes and specimens of species included in Appendices II and III).

PurposeDescription: Breeding in captivity or artificial propagation
SourceDescription: Animals bred in captivity in accordance with Resolution Conf. 10.16 (Rev.), as well as parts and derivatives thereof, exported under the provisions of Article VII, paragraph 5, of the Convention.

PurposeDescription: Breeding in captivity or artificial propagation
SourceDescription: Appendix-I animals bred in captivity for commercial purposes in operations included in the Secretariat's Register, in accordance with Resolution Conf. 12.10 (Rev. CoP15), and Appendix-I plants artificially propagated for commercial purposes, as well as parts and derivatives thereof, exported under the provisions of Article VII, paragraph 4, of the Convention.

PurposeDescription: Breeding in captivity or artificial propagation
SourceDescription: Animals born in captivity (F1 or subsequent generations) that do not fulfil the definition of 'bred in captivity' in Resolution Conf. 10.16 (Rev.), as well as parts and derivatives thereof.
